caption.title: The number of hyper- and hypomethylated DMRs overlapping with ChIP-seq peaks.
caption.p: Relation between DMRs and Fam60a binding site for E9.5 embryos. Methyl-seq data were obtained for three Fam60a–/– and three WT embryos, and ChIP-seq data were obtained for ChIP-seq1 and ChIP-seq2 experiments. The number of ChIP-seq peaks that overlap with all or the top 500 hyper- and hypomethylated DMRs are shown.
